ALL_ARMOR.description: Applies to all armor pieces (helmets, chestplates, leggings, boots) of any material type (leather, chainmail, iron, gold, diamond, netherite)

ALL_SWORD.description: Applies to all sword types (wooden, stone, iron, gold, diamond, netherite)

ALL_AXE.description: Applies to all axe types (wooden, stone, iron, gold, diamond, netherite) - both as a tool and weapon

ALL_SPADE.description: Applies to all shovel types (wooden, stone, iron, gold, diamond, netherite)

ALL_PICKAXE.description: Applies to all pickaxe types (wooden, stone, iron, gold, diamond, netherite)

ALL_HELMET.description: Applies to all helmet types (leather, chainmail, iron, gold, diamond, netherite)

ALL_CHESTPLATE.description: Applies to all chestplate types (leather, chainmail, iron, gold, diamond, netherite)

ALL_LEGGINGS.description: Applies to all leggings types (leather, chainmail, iron, gold, diamond, netherite)

ALL_BOOTS.description: Applies to all boots types (leather, chainmail, iron, gold, diamond, netherite)
